mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT rb.room_bed FROM room_count rc INNER JOIN room_bed rb ON rc.rb_id = rb.rb_id WHERE rc.room_id = #{room_id};
SELECT DISTINCT rv.room_view FROM room_count rc INNER JOIN room_view rv ON rc.rv_id = rv.rv_id WHERE rc.room_id = #{room_id};
select count(*) from room_reserve where room_id = #{room_id} and (out_date > #{in_date} and in_date < #{out_date})
